document_notes.text:
This update for cifs-utils fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-27239: Fixed a buffer overflow in the command line ip option (bsc#1197216).
document_notes.title: Details

SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15 SP4

notes.text: In cifs-utils through 6.14, a stack-based buffer overflow when parsing the mount.cifs ip= command-line argument could lead to local attackers gaining root privileges.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

product_id: SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15 SP4:cifs-utils-6.15-150400.3.6.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15 SP4:cifs-utils-devel-6.15-150400.3.6.1

description.text: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
